title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Justice) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister justice) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Mr Patrick Cluskey & Mr Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose addresses
text_raw:
2. Mr Patrick Cluskey & Mr Fiach Kelly, particulars of whose addresses 
have been deposited at the offices of the Department of Justice, 51 St. 
Stephen’s Green, Dublin 2, are appointed to be a Special Advisers to the 
Minister for Justice with effect from 1 November 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

9 November, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [779] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
